alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 3:07AM CST until December 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW TO CAUSE POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS TRAVEL CONDITIONS IN NORTHERN WISCONSIN TODAY... .Snow is expected across most of the area today, beginning by mid- morning and tapering off by late afternoon. A total accumulation of 2 to 4 inches is expected across northern Wisconsin, with the highest totals near the Upper Michigan border. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Highest accumulations near the Iron Mountain area. * WHERE...Northern Wisconsin. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could linger through the Tuesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwesterly winds of 10 to 20 mph will likely reduce visibility to 1 to 3 miles during periods of snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
